subject: [Mhln] Update OEM Mass Storage Driver in Windows Server 2003
body:
Colors answer feeling in man shapes answer thought and motion answers will.

I know of no method to secure the repeal of bad or obnoxious laws so effective as their strict execution.

What do we live for if it is not to make life less difficult to each other?

Home is where there's one to love us.

The people of the world having once been deceived, suspect deceit in truth itself.

The best safety lies in fear.

I could never bear to be buried with people to whom I had not been introduced.

The easiest thing to find on God's green earth is someone to tell you all the things you cannot do.

Death may be the King of terrors... but Jesus is the King of kings!

Water, taken in moderation, cannot hurt anybody.

Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.

It is easier to keep half a dozen lovers guessing than to keep one lover after he has stopped guessing.

We find comfort among those who agree with us-growth among those who don't.
